name: Mystillion
description:
Once. A certain village was destroyed by the hands of the devil.
"Red Village Tragedy - "
The only girl who survived the incident called that - Isla.
Even though she was tormented by the memories of her past, she lived each day to the fullest.

Genre: AVG (ADV), R18
Otome (Maiden) Adventure Game, Western Fantasy Setting
3 characters are the conquest of your love.
28 still images
This game can be played with only a mouse.


Islay
The sole survivor of the "Red Village Tragedy " incident.
After the incident, she was taken in by the Selo Orphanage and lives on the outskirts of town.
Although he is alone for the rest of his life, he also has the strength to try and keep a bright smile.
He is on good terms with Raphiel, a young priest apprentice.
I'm doing my best to be useful to the town that picked me up, but...?


Noin
A critically injured young man who appears before the protagonist. Call yourself a demon hunter.
Although he has a desire to take revenge on the devil "Ille Coronam", he is defeated.
The fact that Isla, who is in the same situation, doesn't think about revenge, throws a stone at him.
Personality is serious and cool-headed. He doesn't talk more than necessary, but that doesn't mean he's silent.
Always wields a pair of gold and silver swords.


Ille Colonum
A demon who drives Noin to the brink of death and breaks into Aira's house. Nicknamed "Devil of the Crown"
According to him, there are a lot of two names.
Even though he bares his fangs that he failed to kill Noin, he is interested in the main character who protects him,
Also, knowing that the main character is a survivor of the incident, he starts messing with Isla.
His remarks are very vague and he's always dizzy, but he seems to have a purpose...?


Raphiel Geri
A young man who is an apprentice priest at the church.
He's a little older than Isla, and has been watching over her since she was little.
A gentle personality who always has a smile on his face.

The player becomes the main character and chooses his own destiny.
Bring happiness to his beloved and many others.
